{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = ARTIK Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.artik.io/modules/artik-520/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Samsung |model = ARTIK |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 5 |revision = VER. 3.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A3LATKM052000 |icid = 649E-ATKM052000 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;Exynos 3250; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KMF5X0005M; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;S25PE10VP; |flash2size = 128 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;KMF5X0005M; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = ASIX;AX88796CLF; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |oui = E8:50:8B |ethoui = 0E:16:40
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2012.07; |stockos = Linux;3.10.9;Fedora 22;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J12
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, ZigBee, Z-Wave, |addchip = ZigBee SoC (32-bit ARM Cortex-M3);Silicon Labs;EM3587;;1;,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Energy FEM;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2432L;;1;,,, Z-Wave SoC (ZM5304-U Module);Sigma Designs;SD3503A-CNE3;;1;,,, Single-Chip SIGFOX RF Transceiver;Atmel;ATA8520D;;1;,,, IoT Secure Element;Samsung;S3FV5RP;;1;,,, USB to Serial UART;FTDI;FT232R;;1;,,, Power Management IC;Samsung;S2MPS14X01;;1;,,, Dual-Supply, 8-Bit Signal Translator;ON Semi;FXMA108;;1;,,, 24bit Stereo CODEC with MIC/HP/SPK-AMP;AsahiKASEI;AK4953A;;1;,,, DC/DC LED Driver;EUTech Micro;EUP2586;;1;,,, Dual Channel I²C/SPI UART with 64-Byte FIFO;Exar;XR20M1172;;1;,,, 8-bit Bi-directional Voltage Translator;Texas Instruments;TXS0108E;;4;,,, 600mA CMOS Linear Regulator;ESMT;EMP8021;;6;,,, Dual BiDirectional I2C-bus and SMBus Voltage-Level Translator;ON Semi;PCA9306;;5;,,, I2C Controlled 3A Single Cell USB Charger;Texas Instruments;BQ24296;;1;,,, Gas-Gauge ASIC;CellWise;CW2015;;1;,,, Single Bus Buffer Gate With 3-State Output;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G125;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = root |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/21/2016 |estreldate = 11/2015 |estprice = 100 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Samsung SWB-B80 |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 3 Dual 3250 @1GHz Dual Core SoC *RAM: 512MB *Storage: 4GB eMMC *GPU: Mali-400 MP2
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/ARTIK ''ARTIK'' on '''Embedded Linux Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/02/19/samsung-artik-iot-boards-and-devkits-with-wifi-bluetooth-le-and-zigbee-available-partners-announced/ ''Samsung Artik IoT Boards and Devkits'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/samsung-debuts-an-artik-iot-cloud-platform-and-ide/ ''Samsung debuts an Artik IoT cloud platform and IDE'' on '''Linux Gizmos''']
